summary.para: The ITfInputProcessorProfileMgr.ActivateProfile method activates the specified text service's profile or keyboard layout.

param.name: dwProfileType
param.para: [in] The type of this profile. This is one of these values.

description.para: This is a text service.
This is a keyboard layout.

param.name: langid
param.para: [in] The language id of the profile to be activated.

param.name: clsid
param.para: [in] The CLSID of the text service of the profile to be activated. This must be CLSID_NULL if dwProfileType is TF_PROFILETYPE_KEYBOARDLAYOUT.

param.name: guidProfile
param.para: [in] The guidProfile of the profile to be activated. This must be GUID_NULL if dwProfileType is TF_PROFILETYPE_KEYBOARDLAYOUT.

param.name: hkl
param.para: [in] The handle of the keyboard layout. This must be NULL if dwProfileType is TF_PROFILETYPE_INPUTPROCESSOR.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: The combination of the following bits:

description.para: Activate this profile for all threads in the process.
Activate this profile for all threads in the current desktop.
Update the registry to enable this profile for this user.

If the current input language does not match with the requested profile's language, TSF marks this profile to be activated when the requested input language is switched. If this flag is off and the current input language is not matched, this method fails.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The method was successful.
The language profile is not enabled.
An unspecified error occurred.
One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfInputProcessorProfileMgr.DeactivateProfile method deactivates the specified text service's profile or keyboard layout.

param.name: dwProfileType
param.para: [in] The type of this profile. This is one of these values.

description.para: This is a text service.
This is a keyboard layout.

param.name: langid

param.name: clsid
param.para: [in] The CLSID of the text service of the profile to be activated. This must be CLSID_NULL if dwProfileType is TF_PROFILETYPE_KEYBOARDLAYOUT.

param.name: guidProfile
param.para: [in] The guidProfile of the profile to be activated. This must be GUID_NULL if dwProfileType is TF_PROFILETYPE_KEYBOARDLAYOUT.

param.name: hkl
param.para: [in] The handle of the keyboard layout. This must be NULL if dwProfileType is TF_PROFILETYPE_INPUTPROCESSOR.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: The combination of the following bits:

description.para: Deactivate this profile for all threads in the process.
Deactivate this profile for all threads in the current desktop.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The method was successful.
An unspecified error occurred.
One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfInputProcessorProfileMgr.EnumProfiles method returns profiles to be enumerated.

param.name: langid
param.para: [in] langid of the profiles to be enumerated. If langid is 0, all profiles will be enumerated.

param.name: ppEnum
param.para: [out] The pointer to receive a pointer of interface.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The method was successful.
An unspecified error occurred.
One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: This method returns the current active profile.

param.name: catid
param.para: [in] The category id for the profile. This must be GUID_TFCAT_TIP_KEYBOARD. Only GUID_TFCAT_TIP_KEYBOARD is supported.

param.name: pProfile
param.para: [out] The buffer to receive the profile information.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The method was successful.
The profile was not found or is not active.
An unspecified error occurred.
One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfInputProcessorProfileMgr.GetProfile method returns the information of the specified text service's profile or keyboard layout in structure.

param.name: dwProfileType
param.para: [in] The type of this profile. This is one of these values.

param.para: [in] The handle of the keyboard layout. This must be NULL if dwProfileType is TF_PROFILETYPE_INPUTPROCESSOR.

summary.para: The ITfInputProcessorProfileMgr.RegisterProfile method registers the text service and the profile.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: [in] CLSID of the text service.

param.name: langid
param.para: [in] The language id of the profile.

param.name: guidProfile
param.para: [in] The GUID to identify the profile.

param.name: pchDesc
param.para: [in, size_is(cchDesc)] The description of the profile.

param.name: cchDesc
param.para: [in] The length of pchDesc.

param.name: pchIconFile
param.para: [in, size_is(cchFile] The full path of the icon file.

param.name: cchFile
param.para: [in] The length of pchIconFile.

param.name: uIconIndex
param.para: [in] The icon index of the icon file for this profile.

param.name: hklsubstitute
param.para: [in] The substitute hkl of this profile.

param.name: dwPreferredLayout
param.para: [in] Unused. this must be 0.

param.name: bEnabledByDefault
param.para: [in] True if this profile is enabled by default.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: [in] The combination of the following bits:

description.para: This profile will not appear in the setting UI.
This profile is available only on the local process.
This profile is available only on the local thread.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The method was successful.
An unspecified error occurred.
One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfInputProcessorProfileMgr.ReleaseInputProcessor method deactivates the profiles belonging to the text services of the specified CLSID and releases the instance of interface.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: [in] CLSID of the textservice to be released.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: [in]

description.para: If this bit is on, this method calls CoFreeUnusedLibrariesEx() so the text services DLL might be freed if it does not have any more COM/DLL reference. Warning: This flag could cause some other unrelated COM/DLL free.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The method was successful.
An unspecified error occurred.
One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfInputProcessorProfileMgr.UnregisterProfile method unregisters the text service and the profile.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: [in] CLSID of the text service.

param.name: langid
param.para: [in] The language id of the profile.

param.name: guidProfile
param.para: [in] The GUID to identify the profile.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: [in] The combination of the following bits:

description.para: If this bit is on, UnregistrProfile unregisters all profiles of the rclsid parameter. The langid and guidProfile parameters are ignored.
The profile was registered on the local process.
The profile was registered on the local thread.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The method was successful.
An unspecified error occurred.
One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfInputProcessorProfileMgr interface is implemented by the TSF manager and used by an application or text service to manipulate the language profile of one or more text services.

remarks.para: Unlike , ITfInputProcessorProfileMgr can manage both keyboard layout and text services seamlessly. In Windows Vista, it is recommended to use this interface instead of using the following methods:
